titleStmt.title: The honour of the garter Displaied in a poeme gratulatorie: entitled to the worthie and renowned Earle of Northumberland. Created Knight of that order, and installd at VVindsore. Anno Regni Elizabethæ. 35. die Iunij. 26. By George Peele, Maister of Artes in Oxenforde.
titleStmt.author: Peele, George, 1556-1596.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the widdowe Charlewood, for Iohn Busbie, and are to be sold at the vvest doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The honour of the honourable order of the Garter.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
